question: Which state has been permitted by the Finance Ministry to borrow Rs 2731 after it achieved â€˜Ease of doing business reform?
explanation:
The Finance Ministry has recently permitted Rajasthan to borrow an additional Rs 2,731 crore after the state achieved ease of doing business reforms.
Rajasthan has now joined the five other states namely, Andhra Pradesh, Karnataka, Madhya Pradesh, Tamil Nadu and Telangana, which were granted additional borrowing permission, through open market borrowings. The borrowing limit of the states was linked to people-centric reforms.
